thread.title: Mrs Marylyn Dales
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Mrs Marylyn Dales

author: Mrs Marylyn Dales
title: Mrs Marylyn Dales
text: I needed a Bristan part, in gold, for my shower. Bristan only stock this part in chrome these days, but they put me on to The Shower Doctor. I was delighted that The Shower Doctor had what I wanted in stock, and soon got the part to me. Would definitely use this company again. An excellent service!
